quote: Tom’s passion for not only technology, but also the way the team was working and interacted with other teams was great to see. I was always very happy that our architecture was evolving in a coherent and sustainable way guided by Tom and his interactions with the other Tech leads.
who: Andy Nesling, Cloud Software Manager at Dyson

quote: Tom was a pleasure to work with and full of energy and passion in solving problems and producing good quality products internally and for clients
who: Mike Crooks, Head of Innovation at Mubaloo

quote: Tom was my team leader for a year and a half at Dyson and he did an amazing job covering that role. With knowledge and expertise on everything cloud related, he has a good eye for architecture designing and always up to date with latest technologies and patterns.
who: Jorge Marín Torres, Engineer at Dyson
